title: Virtual.DJ.v4.1r2-maz
description:
****^****^** maz **^****^****

Product:Atomix Virtual DJ Pro v4.1R2 

NOTICE:HAVE UNPACKED,SCANNED TRYED,AND CREATED SVF-FILES.

InfoPage:http://www.virtualdj.com/products/virtualdj/index.html

VirtualDJ is the hottest MP3 mixing software, targeting every DJ from bedroom 
DJs to professional superstars like Carl Cox.
With its breakthrough BeatLock engine, your songs will always stay in the beat, 
and you can work your mixes incredibly faster than any other DJ could.

The automatic seamless loop engine and the brand new synchronised sampler will 
let you perform astounding remixes live, with no preparation at all. The visual 
representation and the cues allow you to clearly see the song&#039;s structure, and 
never be surprised by a break anymore.

Fit with an evolutionary interface engine, the look and feel of VirtualDJ adapts 
itself to your level. Start with an easy-to-use skin to learn with, then choose 
amongst the dozen skins available, from the simplest to the most complex ones.

VirtualDJ is today&#039;s only software to provide:
- A clear superimposed view of the music beats
- A synchronized sampler for intuitive live remixes
- Music video scratching, with an unrivalled fluidity
- An anti-skip technology, when scratching with timecoded vinyls
- And many other extraordinary features as you&#039;ll soon discover...

Do not hesitate any more, there&#039;s a reason why VirtualDJ has been adopted by more than 

Installation:
*Run setup
*Start up and enter serial.
*If trubbel let me know.

***^***^*** Big thanx for serial ***^***^***
